<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Populate the Section Map from COFF section headers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A Section Map seem to be a copy of a COFF section list in other format.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// I don&#39;t know why a PDB file contains both a COFF section header and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a Section Map, but it seems it must be present in a PDB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbistreambuilder/#a0af5d507fc700e7925e19c7e2911be9b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbistreambuilder/#a0af5d507fc700e7925e19c7e2911be9b">DbiStreamBuilder::createSectionMap</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;llvm::object::coff&#95;section&gt;</a> SecHdrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
